entry.attrib: This is a phrasebook that consists out of nearly 200 phrases, we tried to use various grammar constructions and a lot of basic vocabulary in these phrases, making them an excellent means to practise a language and learning vocabulary by just reading phrases.
voh ek choti pakhsi dekhti hai
main aapka sar sparsh karta hoon
voh ek naya safed gaadi chahta hai
ladki yeh bhaari kaala darwaza band karti hai
